interest_explanation: The update to Mistral AI's documentation includes a minor addition of 'Audio & Transcription' to the capabilities section, but does not introduce any significant technical innovations or business impact.

# Bienvenue to Mistral AI Documentation

Mistral AI is a research lab building the best open source models in the world.
